FlowGraph

Struct ViewportRect

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Coordinates
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

A rectangle in viewport coordinate space.

Viewport rectangles represent bounded regions in screen/control space. The most common use is representing the viewport bounds itself (the visible area). 

public readonly record struct ViewportRect : IEquatable<ViewportRect>
Implements
IEquatable<ViewportRect>

ViewportRect(double, double, double, double)

A rectangle in viewport coordinate space.

Viewport rectangles represent bounded regions in screen/control space. The most common use is representing the viewport bounds itself (the visible area).
